Subbed Projects.Show Name: Clannad: After Story - Mou Hitotsu no Sekai, Kyou-hen
Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei

Good Comments: So infatuated with Japanese words they use them even when there's no need.
They have it and no one else does.
good for speedsub, but use WinD for archiving.
Subs were good, as well as the quality. Karaoke was missing, but that's really not an important thing at all...great work!
Bad Comments: shit sux + lol at giving yourself good ratings while all other subs were crap. inferior to Wind's release in any way
Because I put an assload of work into it, and it was out the day after the raw came out.
They actually finished the series. That's a big thing. Easy to understand translation, too.
The text's font was the same as it is in most VNs. I found that that was a nice touch.

Good Comments: Flows very nicely and brings out the wit in the series much better than other subs. Wording for other subs seems stilted or too wordy.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Ookami to Koushinryou II: Ookami to Kohakuiro no Yuuutsu

Good Comments: Some incorrect translations, subtitles too grouped together, don't know how to spell: "Shepherd" not "sheppard"
Missing Subtitles near the end, poor sentence structure and occasional untranslated words
Watched a combo of ASR and BSS and while neither was good, ASR's version was better.
Bad Comments:
mistranslations all over the place!
Huge SUBS...
Not worth the hassle of downloading at all!

Good Comments: Nice alternative to SubSmith but I don't suppose they'll sub episode 2 and 3.
Bad Comments: Best video quality available in english until THORA does a 1080 version.
